title: Deep in the Misanthropy Hole
description: Judge John Hodgman and Bailiff Jesse Thorn return to chambers this week to clear the docket. They discuss eggshell disposal, baseball team allegiance, white lies and more! Plus some follow up letters about cats!
author: shows@maximumfun.org (Jesse Thorn)
